cards.title: Compact sanding kit for precise finishing
cards.alt: Close-up photo of sanding discs on a work surface
cards.desc: A practical selection of abrasives that helps you sand, smooth, and prep wood, metal, and plastics with fewer swaps and predictable, consistent results.

cards.title: Assorted sanding discs for orbital sanders
cards.alt: Detail image of abrasive sheets arranged neatly
cards.desc: Versatile discs and sheets designed for efficient surface prep, helping you handle repairs, refinishing, and polishing while keeping workflow simple and tidy.

cards.title: Wet dry abrasive sheets for many projects
cards.alt: Random orbital sander pads stacked in a set
cards.desc: Reliable sanding accessories that support careful material removal and clean finishing passes across common projects, from furniture touchups to auto detailing.

cards.title: Detail sander pads for corners and edges
cards.alt: Hand sanding sheets laid flat on a tabletop
cards.desc: A balanced mix of grits that fits day-to-day tasks, allowing steady progress from shaping to finishing while maintaining control and uniform surface quality.

cards.title: Durable sanding belts for wood and metal
cards.alt: Assorted sanding belts and discs for DIY tasks
cards.desc: Durable abrasives for routine shop work that transition smoothly between coarse shaping and fine finishing, helping you achieve neat, even surfaces quickly.

cards.title: Fine to coarse sandpaper for DIY repairs
cards.alt: Small detail sander pads displayed in a group
cards.desc: Essential sanding components intended to streamline prep and finishing steps on typical DIY jobs, providing steady cut rate and manageable dust during use.

cards.title: Hook and loop discs for quick changes for everyday use
cards.alt: Wet dry sandpaper sheets prepared for finishing
cards.desc: A straightforward assortment for common sanding chores, supporting quick changes and even scratch patterns as you move through each grit in sequence.

cards.title: Micro sander set for hard-to-reach spots
cards.alt: Compact micro sander kit components on a desk
cards.desc: Handy sanding and polishing pieces that improve task flow, letting you refine edges, level surfaces, and complete light restoration with minimal fuss.

cards.title: Silicon carbide sheets for smooth results
cards.alt: Polishing and sanding accessories in a bundle
cards.desc: Everyday abrasive helpers for careful surface preparation, giving you dependable performance when smoothing, blending, and polishing varied materials.

cards.title: Polishing and sanding pads for drills for everyday use
cards.alt: Hook and loop sanding discs shown in close view
cards.desc: Quality sanding aids suitable for small repairs and light refinishing, promoting consistent patterns and smooth transitions from coarse to fine passes.
